pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, September 7, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion at the 2018 Deloitte Canada Partner Meeting.

Canada Hall 1-2, Shaw Centre
55 Colonel By Drive

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should present themselves in Room 107 no later than 10:30 a.m.

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Hillel Lodge to mark the arrival of Rosh Hashanah.

Hillel Lodge
10 Nadolny Sachs Private

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media should arrive no later than 2:00 p.m.
